document_data.name: Fruug
document_data.mainbody: '''Fruug''', was a servant of [[Zariel]] who served her alongside [[Florenta]] and her flame, the [[tiefling]] named [[Karlach]], during her time in the [[Nine Hells]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: When Karlach Cliffgate escaped the Hells in the {{YearlinkName|1492}} abroad a ''[[spelljammer]]'' ship, Florenta sent [[sulphur]]-reeking notes to [[Toril]]. One such note that found Karlach talked about Fruug getting stuck in a [[butter]] barrel and, when his little [[imp]] tried to help its master, both plummeted into a volcano to Florenta's amusement. Flo laughed so hard that Zariel sent her out of the room.
